segments.text: Have you given the puppies anything to eat today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! Could you please bathe them later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! Remember that they go to the vet this Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . What time is their appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to have them there at 11
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it . I will remember .
segments.speaker: S2
